translation:
Among my old papers, which I happened to review yesterday, I came across the receipt attached, by which I see that the State owes Teodolindo solely 344 hides, which at 960 réis each amount to 330$240, and not 426$240 as stated in the document that was issued to him, and was presented to me to send him other hides.

So please look into this, and let me know if I am the one who is mistaken. I wish to be heard regarding the account of the same before it is decided by the Court, etc., etc., etc…

Kindly provide me with the list of books that I supplied to the Court, in order to sort these documents out once and for all, etc…
